meleeap1.0.description:
## README ##
https://github.com/PinkSwitch/SSBMArchipelago#-setting-up-your-game-

# Super Smash Bros. Melee Archipelago Version 1.0 #
* Initial Release
## Known Issues ##
* The Percent display on the Lottery menu can be wonky and incorrect. The ACTUAL likelihood of rolling a new trophy functions as expected.
* Getting all of the trophies in a lottery pool will say your trophy class increases, however the class increase ha been removed
meleeap1.0.title: Archipelago Melee v1.0

meleeap1.0.2.description:
## README ##
https://github.com/PinkSwitch/SSBMArchipelago#-setting-up-your-game-

# Super Smash Bros. Melee Archipelago Version 1.0.2 #
# Fixes #
- Fixed Triforce Gathering missing Link requirement
- Fixed the characters for events 42-45 being erroneously shifted
- Game/Watch unlock match logic now checks for every character besides game n watch
## Known Issues ##
* The Percent display on the Lottery menu can be wonky and incorrect. The ACTUAL likelihood of rolling a new trophy functions as expected.
* Getting all of the trophies in a lottery pool will say your trophy class increases, however the class increase ha been removed
meleeap1.0.2.title: Archipelago Melee v1.0.2

meleeap1.1.description:
## README ##
https://github.com/PinkSwitch/SSBMArchipelago#-setting-up-your-game-

# Super Smash Bros. Melee Archipelago Version 1.1 #
## New Settings ##
* ``Hard All-Star Clear`` has been **REPLACED** with ``Hard Mode Clears``, which covers all main 1-Player Modes and the Very Hard bonus (if bonuses are enabled)
* ``10-Man Sanity``: Adds a check for each character clearing 10-Man Melee
## Changes ##
* Classic Clear Game & Watch (the flat zone check) reassigned to Any Main 1P mode
* Added a new Command to the client; ``/rig (trophy)``- Using this allows you to pay 30 coins while in the lottery to gurantee your next pull will be a trophy that you specify, from any of your unlocked lottery pools.
# Fixes #
- Assigned the Topi and Polar Bear KO bonuses to Adventure mode
* Fixed numerous bonuses having their trigger being off by one (Poser, Angelic, avenger KO, coward, weight lifter, stale moves)
* Fixed Vanilla lottery pool not generating
* Kirby Hat 4 now triggers properly
* Fixed the Hobbyist bonus not triggering
* Fixed Falco's unlock match not triggering if you previously completed the Mewtwo unlock match
* Fixed Tap Jump still triggering on Kirby/Jigglypuff's multi jump and shield jumps
## Known Issues ##
* The Percent display on the Lottery menu can be wonky and incorrect. The ACTUAL likelihood of rolling a new trophy functions as expected.
* Getting all of the trophies in a lottery pool will say your trophy class increases, however the class increase ha been removed
meleeap1.1.title: Archipelago Melee v1.1
